verses.content: Mi suol chu tukhawm ihnawt naw khawmin a tlânsie a, Mi felhai ruok chu sakeibaknei angin an huoi.
Ramin a bawsiet pha chu rorêl- tu tamtak a hung nei hlak a, Nisienlakhawm, hrietna le hrietthiemna nei mihai lei chun ram chu ngirsuok a tih.
Mi tlasam mi pasie nêksâwrtu chu, Ruo pheisûr bu hla lo ang chu a nih.
Dân mâksantuhai chun mi rilo chu an inpâk a, Dân vawngtuhai chu anni leh an inkhing.
Mi suol chun rorêlna chu a hrietthiem nawh a, LALPA zawngtuhai ruok chun thil po po an hrietthiem.
Mi pasie lungril ṭha put chu Hausa khawhlotaka um nêk chun a ṭha lem.
Tukhawm dân vawngtu chu naupa var a nih, Mi hnukinrâwl inruolpuitu ruok chun a pa a sukzak.
Sum duâmna le hlâwkna dinga a thuomhnaw sukpungtu chun, Mi pase chunga lunginsietna neitu ta dingin a khâwlkhâwm a nih.
Dân chu ngai dinga a na sit nawtu chu, A ṭawngṭâina khawm chu tirdakum a nih.
Tukhawm mi tluong suolna lampuia infe pêttirtu taphawt chu, Ama khur ngeia chun tlâng a tih, Mi fel ruok chun thilṭha ro chu hluong a tih.
Mi hausa chu ama ngairuotna ngeia chun a var a, Mi pasie hrietthiemna neitu ruok chun ama chu a zawng suok hlak.
Mi fel chu a hlawtling pha chun, chawimawina nasatak a um hlak a, Mi khawhlo chu a tho ve pha ruok chun mi an inbihmang hlak.
Mi a bawsietna inkhumtu chu hlawtling naw nih a, Thupha chawia, nghatsan hlaktu ruok chun zângaina hmûng a tih.
LALPA ṭi zing zinga um hlak mi chu a lâwm a, A lungril sukngartu ruok chu lungngainaah tla lût a tih.
Rorêltu suol chu mi pase chunga chun, Sakeibaknei inrûm hlak le savawm inhûk hlak ang hi a nih.
Lal naupa hrietthiemna tlasam hi nêksâwrtu nasatak a na, Hlâwkna indiklo theidatu ruok chun a nihai suksei a tih.
Mi tukhawm mi dang hrim hrim thisena suksipa um chu Khur tieng chun tlân hmang a ta, tukhawma chel naw raw se.
Tukhawm tluongtaka fe mi chu sanhim nîng an ta, A lampuihaia pêthmangtu ruok chu, kârloin tlu nghâl a tih.
Ama ram inlettu chun bu tamtak nei a ta, Mi teplo mei meihai zuitu ruok chun, pasietna a huntâwk zet nei a tih.
Mi ringum chun malsâwmnahai a hau a, Mi hausa dinga hmawsaruma thilthaw ruok chu hrem lo ni naw nih.
Mihai thlierbîkna nei hi a ṭha nawh a, Bei hlek lei mei meiin min a bawsiet bawk ding a ni nawh.
Mit rilo neitu chun hausakna- hai a bawin a bawh a, Tlâksamna a chungah a hung tlung ding a nih ti a hriet nawh.
Leia mi inpâkdertu nêk chun. Mi kâwktu chun a hnungah dit- sakna tam lem hmûng a tih.
Tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amani inrupêk a, “Bawsietna a ni nawh,” titu chu, Chu mi chu suksetu ruolpa chu a nih.
Lungrila huomhap mi chun inkhingna a chawktho a; LALPA chunga a ringna innghattu ruok chu sukthâu nîng a tih.
Mi mâni lungril ngawt ringtu chu invêt a nih, Tukhawm vartaka fetu ruok chu, ama chu sanhim nîng a tih.
Mi pase kuoma petu chu tlasam ngai naw nih a, A mithai insimsan el hlaktu ruok chun ṭawngsie tamtak phur a tih.
Mi khawhlo chu a tho ve pha khawm, mi an inbihmang hlak a, Amiruokchu, an bohmang chun, mi fel chu an pung hlak.
